name: ImpairedSleepSnoring
title: Impaired Sleep  Snoring
description: Indiciation of whether the person has been told that they snore loudly or gasp for breath at night (Y/N) (Business ID: Entry 2039281)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Impaired Sleep  Snoring.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an indiciation of whether the person has been told that they snore loudly or gasp for breath at night (y/n).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Impaired Sleep  Snoring.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Impaired Sleep  Snoring.)
